Context:
The George Brown College collects personal information for administering its statutory objects and powers, programs, activities, and services. They collect personal information under the Ontario Colleges of Applied Arts and Technology Act and in accordance with the Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act. As of 2019, they are required to include Social Insurance Numbers (SIN) on the T2202 tax form for post-secondary institutions as per Canada Revenue Agency's regulations. The official tuition receipt for tax purposes (T2202) is available each year in February. Courses taken during the preceding calendar year are issued once a year, at the end of February. Official receipts are only issued for tuition fees totalling $100.00 or more. Administrative fees are not eligible for tax deduction. A $20 administration fee is applicable for all tax receipts requested prior to 2019. The T2202 tax forms and administrative fee can be obtained by calling the number 416-415-5000, ext. 4493 or emailing [T2202tax@georgebrown.ca](mailto:T2202tax@georgebrown.ca). For more information, contact 416-415-XXXX (phone number missing in the text). The password for accessing STU-VIEW account can be re-activated by calling their call centre at 416-415-2000 (TTY 1-877-515-5559) or 1-800-265-2002 between certain hours with your Student ID number.

Entities: George Brown College, Ontario Colleges of Applied Arts and Technology Act, Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act, Canada Revenue Agency (CRA), T2202 tax form, STU-VIEW account, call centre.

Facts: The text is a general collection notice from the George Brown College for personal information. They collect information under certain acts and for specific purposes. They require SIN on T2202 forms as of 2019. Official tuition receipts are available in February each year, with fees totalling $100 or more being eligible for tax deduction. Administrative fees are not eligible. A fee is applicable for tax receipts requested prior to 2019. The contact details for obtaining these forms are provided. Instructions on viewing and printing tax receipts are also given.

Context: For questions about tuition tax receipts, contact T2202tax@georgebrown.ca or call 416-415-5000 ext. 4493. The phone number for the TTY is 1-877-515-5559. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements. Phone number: 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559). Email addresses: T2202tax@georgebrown.ca and ask.george@georgebrown.ca. Social media hub is also available for more information.
